description:
Taylor Swift and Abigail Anderson have been best friends for years—just listen to Taylor's hit "Fifteen" if you need a history lesson in their friendship. Abigail even appeared in videos for some of Taylor's earliest singles, like "Picture to Burn" and "Teardrops on My Guitar."泰勒·斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）和阿比盖尔·安德森(Abigail Anderson)是多年挚友，泰勒的单曲《Fifteen》就续写了两人的友谊。阿比盖尔还曾出现在泰勒早期的一些MV中，比如《Picture to Burn》和《Teardrops on My Guitar》。

Fame hasn't changed their bond. Abigail is a fixture at Taylor's parties and appeared in her "22" video. Abigail was even Taylor's date to the Grammys in 2015.泰勒大红并未影响两人的关系。有泰勒的聚会必有阿比盖尔，阿比盖尔也曾在泰勒单曲《22》MV中露面。2015年，阿比盖尔还陪同泰勒参加了格莱美音乐奖（Grammys）。

So obviously, when Abigail got engaged to photographer Matt Lucier, she asked Taylor to be a part of her special day. This weekend, Taylor was by Abigail's side at her wedding in Martha's Vineyard, Massachusetts, People reports. She even carried the bride's train.所以，当阿比盖尔与摄影师马特·路斯尔（Matt Lucier）订婚时，肯定少不了霉霉，作为婚礼的见证人。据《人物》报道，上周末，阿比盖尔在马萨诸塞州的马萨葡萄园岛举办婚礼，泰勒担任伴娘，还同乘了新娘马车。

Taylor looked effortlessly stunning in her floor-length gown - which cut into a classic sweetheart neckline and clung to her slender frame, before cascading into a soft A-line skirt. Keeping co-ordinated from head to toe, Taylor matched the dress' hue with a bold wine-coloured lipstick, and sported a soft smoky eye and loose curls to elegantly tie the look together.身穿拖地礼服裙的泰勒非常惊艳，经典的心形领格外贴身，下摆自然垂落。为了搭配裙子，泰勒涂了大胆的酒红色口红，眼部是轻烟熏妆，卷发蓬松，全身得体优雅。

Taylor appeared completely relaxed as she spent a weekend with her family and friends at the wedding - after the release of the first single from her new album, Look What You Made Me Do, and its somewhat controversial music video.和家人朋友在婚礼中共度了一个周末，泰勒看上去非常放松。这也是泰勒发布新专辑首支单曲《Look What You Made Me Do》后首次以如此惬意的姿态露面，而新曲MV引起了不小的争议。

Despite setting tongues wagging however, the song has already found huge success, and has rocketed to the top spot of the UK chart in its first week, following 30,000 downloads and 5.3 million streams.除了有些拗口，这首新曲已经非常轰动了，首周发行就登上了英国单曲榜榜首，下载量达3万，播放量达530万。

There was a much darker, edgier feeling to the new release - which saw an angry-looking Swift dressed in all black, as she supposedly took jabs at Katy Perry, Kanye West, Kim Kardashian and Tom Hiddleston in the lyrics.这首新曲的风格偏黑暗、愤怒——泰勒穿着一身黑，很生气，仿佛在用歌词报复水果姐、侃爷、金·卡戴珊和抖森。

（翻译：阿忙）

title: 霉霉低调当伴娘，不过好像胖了一圈..
